tasks.label: Check Virtual Environment
args: if [ -z "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ]; then echo "WARN: Virtual environment not active! Run: source venv/bin/activate"; exit 1; else echo "OK: Virtual environment active: $VIRTUAL_ENV"; fi

tasks.label: Run Shakedown Test
args: if [ -z "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ]; then echo "WARN: Virtual environment not active! Run: source venv/bin/activate"; exit 1; else echo "OK: Virtual environment active: $VIRTUAL_ENV"; fi; if [ -n "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ] && [ -x "$VIRTUAL_ENV/bin/python" ]; then PYTHON="$VIRTUAL_ENV/bin/python"; else PYTHON=python; fi; if [ -f memory/tests/shakedown-script.md ]; then $PYTHON ${workspaceFolder}/uDOS.py --script memory/tests/shakedown-script.md; else $PYTHON -m pytest memory/tests/test_shakedown_destroy_v1_1_0.py; fi

tasks.label: Wizard: Run Server (interactive, auto-port)
args: PORT=$(${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python -m wizard.cli_port_manager available 9000 | tr -cd "0-9"); ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python -m wizard.cli_port_manager reassign wizard $PORT >/dev/null; echo "$PORT" > ${workspaceFolder}/.wizard-port; echo "Wizard port: $PORT"; PYTHONPATH="${workspaceFolder}" ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python -m wizard.server --port $PORT

tasks.label: Dashboard: Serve dist (http)
args: PORT=$(${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python -m wizard.cli_port_manager available 9100 | tr -cd "0-9"); echo "$PORT" > ${workspaceFolder}/.dashboard-port; echo "Dashboard port: $PORT"; cd ${workspaceFolder}/wizard/dashboard/dist && python -m http.server $PORT

tasks.label: uCODE: Dispatch Command
args: PORT=$(cat ${workspaceFolder}/.wizard-port 2>/dev/null || echo 8765); curl -sS -H "Authorization: Bearer $WIZARD_ADMIN_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"command": "${input:ucodeCommand}"}' http://localhost:$PORT/api/ucode/dispatch

tasks.label: Find Lost Commit
tasks.command: git show 2cf5d9f --stat 2>&1 || git reflog | grep '2cf5d9f' || git log --all --oneline | grep '2cf5d9f'

tasks.label: Commit and Push TUI Work
tasks.command:
git add core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git commit -m "feat: Enhance TUI form rendering with proper ANSI display width handling

- Fix display width calculations in form_fields.py to handle ANSI codes
- Add BarSelector and LocationSelector boxed styling
- Improve DatePicker, TimePicker, and DateTimeApproval rendering
- Add alternate screen buffer support in story_form_handler.py
- Better keyboard navigation (arrow keys now inc/dec values)
- Add CHECKBOX field type support
- Fix TextInput field rendering and input handling
- Improve logging for debugging TUI interactions" && git push origin main

tasks.label: Check Recent Diffs
tasks.command: git diff HEAD@{1} HEAD -- core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py | head -50

tasks.label: Recover from HEAD@{1}
tasks.command: git show HEAD@{1}:core/tui/form_fields.py > /tmp/form_fields_recovered.py && git show HEAD@{1}:core/tui/story_form_handler.py > /tmp/story_form_handler_recovered.py && git show HEAD@{1}:core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts > /tmp/index_recovered.ts && echo 'Files recovered to /tmp'

tasks.label: Restore TUI Files
tasks.command: cp /tmp/form_fields_recovered.py core/tui/form_fields.py && cp /tmp/story_form_handler_recovered.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py && cp /tmp/index_recovered.ts core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git diff --stat

tasks.label: Commit and Push TUI
tasks.command:
git add core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git commit -m 'feat: Enhance TUI form rendering

- Fix ANSI display width calculations
- Add boxed styling for selectors
- Improve keyboard navigation
- Add CHECKBOX field type
- Add alternate screen buffer support' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Commit TUI Work
tasks.command: git add core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git commit -m 'feat: enhance TUI form rendering and keyboard navigation' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Final Commit
tasks.command: cp /tmp/form_fields_recovered.py core/tui/form_fields.py && cp /tmp/story_form_handler_recovered.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py && cp /tmp/index_recovered.ts core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git add -A && git commit -m 'feat: enhance TUI form rendering' && git push

tasks.label: Commit with Rebase
tasks.command: cp /tmp/form_fields_recovered.py core/tui/form_fields.py && cp /tmp/story_form_handler_recovered.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py && cp /tmp/index_recovered.ts core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git add core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && git commit -m 'feat: enhance TUI forms' && git pull --rebase && git push

tasks.label: Restore Files Check
tasks.command: cp /tmp/form_fields_recovered.py core/tui/form_fields.py && cp /tmp/story_form_handler_recovered.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py && cp /tmp/index_recovered.ts core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts && ls -lh core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts

tasks.label: Commit and Push
tasks.command: git add core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py core/grid-runtime/src/index.ts; git commit -m 'feat: enhance TUI form rendering'; git push

tasks.label: Configure and Push
tasks.command: git config pull.rebase false && git pull --no-edit && git push

tasks.label: Stash TUI Styling
tasks.command: git stash push -m "tui form styling stash" core/tui/form_fields.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py

tasks.label: Stash TUI Styling Snapshot
tasks.command: mkdir -p .stash-tui && cp core/tui/form_fields.py .stash-tui/form_fields.py && cp core/tui/story_form_handler.py .stash-tui/story_form_handler.py && git stash push -m "tui form styling snapshot" --include-untracked .stash-tui/form_fields.py .stash-tui/story_form_handler.py

tasks.label: Compare TUI Styling Snapshot
tasks.command: git show stash@{0}:.stash-tui/form_fields.py > /tmp/form_fields_stash.py && git show stash@{0}:.stash-tui/story_form_handler.py > /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py && diff -u /tmp/form_fields_stash.py core/tui/form_fields.py | head -40 && echo "---" && diff -u /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py | head -40

tasks.label: Compare TUI Styling Snapshot (Retry)
tasks.command: git show "stash@{0}:.stash-tui/form_fields.py" > /tmp/form_fields_stash.py && git show "stash@{0}:.stash-tui/story_form_handler.py" > /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py && diff -u /tmp/form_fields_stash.py core/tui/form_fields.py | head -40 && echo "---" && diff -u /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py | head -40

tasks.label: Compare TUI Styling Snapshot (Ref)
tasks.command: stashref=$(git stash list | head -1 | cut -d: -f1) && git show "$stashref:.stash-tui/form_fields.py" > /tmp/form_fields_stash.py && git show "$stashref:.stash-tui/story_form_handler.py" > /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py && diff -u /tmp/form_fields_stash.py core/tui/form_fields.py | head -40 && echo "---" && diff -u /tmp/story_form_handler_stash.py core/tui/story_form_handler.py | head -40

tasks.label: Locate Wizard Logs
tasks.command: ls -la wizard/logs 2>/dev/null || ls -la logs 2>/dev/null || find . -maxdepth 3 -type d -name '*log*' | head -20

tasks.label: Tail Memory Logs
tasks.command: ls -lt memory/logs | head -10 && echo '---' && tail -n 200 memory/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null | tail -n 200
